com.facebook.buck.util

Class DirectoryTraversal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.util.DirectoryTraversal

  • public abstract class DirectoryTraversal
extends Object
    Traverses all files in a directory. This class will follow symlinks. Unfortunately, Java 6 is not "symlink aware". In Java 7, this class could be replaced with java.nio.file.Files.walkFileTree.

    In the event where symlinks should be traversed, consider shelling out to Python and using os.walk(), which provides the option to traverse symlinks.
